productDescription: A crispy, savory crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter, filled with a spicy potato and onion mixture. Served with sambar and coconut chutney.
Tender pieces of chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, grilled in a tandoor oven, and then simmered in a creamy tomato sauce.
A rich and flavorful curry made with  spinach, paneer (Indian cheese), and a blend of aromatic spices.
A hearty lentil stew cooked with butter, cream, and a mix of spices, known for its smooth, creamy texture and rich flavor.
Soft, melt-in-your-mouth milk-based dumplings soaked in a sweet and fragrant rose-flavored syrup.
A classic Italian dish made with a crispy crust, tomato sauce, and melted cheese.
A versatile dish made with noodles and a variety of sauces.
A healthy and refreshing mix of greens, vegetables, and dressing.
Japanese dish of vinegared rice topped with seafood or vegetables.
A juicy patty of ground meat sandwiched between a bun.
